statements.select: select id, id_product, str_title, str_content, dec_prize, int_order, int_video_type, int_video_source_type, str_video_path, int_min_correct_answer, ind_featured, id_insert_by, id_update_by, dt_insert, dt_update, ind_active from tb_product_video
where id_product = #value# and ind_active = 1 order by int_order asc
where ind_active = 1 order by int_order asc

select distinct pv.* from tb_product_video pv inner join tb_product_permission per on per.id_product = pv.id_product inner join tb_product p on p.id = pv.id_product inner join tb_permission perm on perm.id = per.str_channel_id inner join tb_user_mobile um on um.id = #userMobileId# where perm.str_channel_id = #channelId# and perm.ind_active = 1 and per.ind_active = 1 and pv.ind_active = 1

select TOP 1 id, id_product, str_title, str_content, dec_prize, int_order, int_video_type, int_video_source_type, str_video_path, int_min_correct_answer, ind_featured, id_insert_by, id_update_by, dt_insert, dt_update, ind_active from tb_product_video where ind_active = 1 order by dt_insert desc

select id, id_product, str_title, str_content, dec_prize, int_order, int_video_type, int_video_source_type, str_video_path, int_min_correct_answer, ind_featured, id_insert_by, id_update_by, dt_insert, dt_update, ind_active from ( select row_number() over ( order by id ) as RowNum, * from tb_product_video where ind_active = 1
id_product = #ProductId#
convert(date, dt_insert) >= convert(date, #DtBegin#)
convert(date, dt_insert) <= convert(date, #DtEnd#)
) AS RowConstrainedResult where RowConstrainedResult.RowNum > #PageStart# AND RowConstrainedResult.RowNum <= #PageEnd# order by RowConstrainedResult.RowNum

select count(*) from ( select row_number() over ( order by id ) as RowNum, * from tb_product_video where ind_active = 1
id_product = #ProductId#
convert(date, dt_insert) >= convert(date, #DtBegin#)
convert(date, dt_insert) <= convert(date, #DtEnd#)
) AS RowConstrainedResult
